Malice:

"I think, we should keep an optic on him.  He is full of deciete, do 
not readily trust him.  Whatever your sister had planned for him, be 
ready to dispence with him.  He may be as treacherous as Starscream."
Malice did not like his clone at all, it may be him in body, but his 
spark was far differant.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacnightmare/Darkfate Nightastrike:
> 
> Nightstrike and darkfate left the base while Blacknightmare 
remained 
> with Malice and looking him she said "What do you think about 
> Injustice?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Yojinbo of Nightmare" 
> <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > Malice/ Injustice/ Splattercannon/ Hellplague:
> > 
> > Malice continued walking with Blacknightmare.  He could tell 
> > Injustice bugged her too.  Maybe Hellplague was asleep when she 
> made 
> > the clone.  He would have to watch his double closely in the near 
> > future.
> > 
> > Injustice shrugged his shoulders.
> > "I guess we should.  So we're supposed to back up Hellplague?  
> Why?  
> > Is she incapible of leading?"
> > The large form of Splattercannon moved quickly in front of the 
> black 
> > and purple clone.
> > "You should know your place.  You can't question your superiors.  
> Be 
> > silent and do as you're told."
> > 
> > The Sweep commander turned to the other Minion before stepping 
> back 
> > to a panel on the wall.
> > "The Cannon, and anyone near it.  Maximal or Predacon, they are 
> all 
> > targets."
> > Hellplague hits a button and the chamber seals it's main door, 
and 
> > the room depressurizes.  The the outer door opens, to reveal the 
> > planet below.  Hellplague opens her comm to the other Minions.
> > "We're are now departing.  Await my signal."
> > Hellplague transforms and the Sweeps follow suit.  She then eases 
> out 
> > into space with the Sweeps in formation behind her.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare/Nightstrike/Darkfate::
> > > 
> > > 
> > > > Malice nodded and followed Blacknightmare, casting a cold 
> glance 
> > > at 
> > > > the clone.
> > > 
> > > BlackNightmare feel camly when they left the room, something 
> about 
> > > this bot made her feel uneasy.
> > >  
> > > > Injustice stood up straight and lost his mad expression.  He 
> > > cleared 
> > > > his throat and spoke to the rest of the minions.
> > > > "He doesn't get out much does he?" he inquired, much to the 
> > > suprise 
> > > > of the others.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nightstrike laughted quietly and said after that serious "We 
> should 
> > > go now... we have work to do"
> > > 
> > >  
> > > > The Sweep commander lead Darkfate down to one of the lower 
> > staging 
> > > > areas where a bunch of the Sweeps were waiting.  
> > > > "We must strike hard and fast.  We must attack the cannon 
fast 
> > > enough 
> > > > to delay any counter attack from the Maximals.  Any questions 
> > > before 
> > > > we leave?"
> > > 
> > > "Who're the victims?"hissed Darkfate
